SummaryEnglish: In the year 2138, virtual reality gaming is booming. Yggdrasil, a popular online game is quietly shut down one day. However, one player named Momonga decides to not log out. Momonga is then transformed into the image of a skeleton as "the most powerful wizard." The world continues to change, with non-player characters (NPCs) beginning to feel emotion. Having no parents, friends, or place in society, this ordinary young man Momonga then strives to take over the new world the game has become.

1.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Play 1: End and Beginning
1.SummaryEnglish: Ainz accidentally used Total Maniac on himself and panicked after regaining his emotions. Even looking at himself scares him. As he is panicking, Albedo breaks into his room, thinking he is in trouble as he did not reply her earlier, which he then gave an excuse that he was thinking about the situation in the upper floors. As he stared at her, he accidentally commented on how beautiful Albedo really is, causing Albedo to become momentarily stunned and become excitedly love struck the next moment.

2.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Play 2: Combat Maids
2.SummaryEnglish: Albedo explained to Ainz that the Pleiades are requesting an audience with him. Ainz initially approved of it but when he was just about to refuse by saying he doesn't feel well, Albedo immediately left the room and called the Battle Maids. When the Pleiades arrived, he ordered them to converse to him normally so they won't notice that he is panicking, which the Pleiades agreed, although each of them have their own unique way of doing so.

3.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Play 3: Fists That Cut Through Lies
3.SummaryEnglish: As Narberal was training in the Amphitheater of the sixth floor, Ainz came and complimented her. Ainz successfully convinced her that he had a reason for ordering them to converse normally with him, making him dance happily. As Narberal asked what he is doing, he made an excuse that his dance is a new magical pose that only he knows of and that pose allows him to cast magic faster, reducing the casting time. Fascinated, Narberal asked him to teach her the magic pose, which Ainz had no choice but to agree. As the two of them danced, the other Pleiades arrived and joined the dance. After that, they thought that they had matured more thanks to Ainz teachings, which caused Ainz to feel even more guilt and ashamed for covering his lies with more lies.

4.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Play 4: Two Victims
4.SummaryEnglish: As Ainz thought about how each member of the Pleiades had a unique personality and were cute, he accidentally shouted "Game is the best" without realizing it. He then thought about how in video games, you can make your ideal girl easily. Then, he saw a blotted Solution Epsilon and asked what happened. Entoma explained that Solution had swallowed a human whole and is currently torturing it with acid. Frightened because of the fact that Solution is dissolving a human inside her, Ainz ordered her to return to her original form and she spits the half-acidified human out, returning back to her slim figure. In order to clean up the mess on the carpet, Entoma carried the human away from sight and ate him alive, making Ainz even more frightened.

5.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Play 5: Heart of a Predator
5.SummaryEnglish: Ainz confirmed the race and classes of the Pleiades members (Yuri almost took off her collar and let her head fall off in the process). He then asked how the Pleiades didn't show much expression, to which Yuri replied that they are still nowhere near Ainz's level. While Lupusregina, CZ, and Narberal spoke of how Yuri can emit a scary aura sometimes, Ainz stared at Entoma and commented on how good she is at making poker faces, which Solution explained that her face is a mimic. Curious of what were the other faces she would make, Ainz ordered her to show them, to which she responded by removing her mask, showing her real face to Ainz, making Ainz scream.

6.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Play 6: Battle Outside Carne Village
6.SummaryEnglish: Ainz asked for the purpose of the Pleiades seeking an audience with him. Yuri explained that Lupusregina wanted to report to him of her mission in Carne Village and would like to use this chance to greet him. Yuri also commented on how Lupusregina didn't seem to understand her mission, to which Lupusregina responded that she knows this and that about Carne Village, including their "Night Activities", making Albedo excited for a second. Ainz asked for Albedo's opinion on the matter, to which Albedo responded that she is an honest child.

7.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Play 7: Before the Artillery
7.SummaryEnglish: Ainz was thinking about CZ's character and wishes to strengthen his relationship with her. When he entered the Laboratory, he found out that CZ has been modified into CZ2128 Δ MK-II by Solution and Entoma (making her look like a tank). They explained that they are strengthening CZ by modifying her. While CZ had no objections, Ainz still disagrees. Solution and Entoma further explained CZ's new features like her Drill and the button in her back that breaks her character. Then, Yuri, Lupusregina, and Narberal entered the room and as Ainz was explaining how Solution and Entoma are going overboard, Solution and Entoma further modified CZ, this time they made her look like Gundam that can also fly.

8.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Play 8: Control and Chaos
8.SummaryEnglish: The effects of Total Maniac wear off on Ainz, restoring his calm demeanor. Curious to test his emotions, he interacts with Albedo but resists her advances. Ainz then organizes his Total Maniac items and reads an Instruction Manual to prevent future mishaps. During a meeting with the Pleiades, a bizarre turn of events occurs as the secret condition to unleash the true power of Total Maniac is accidentally triggered. Chaos ensues as the Pleiades undergo peculiar transformations, leaving everyone puzzled. Throughout the episode, Ainz faces both humorous and tense moments while dealing with the aftermath of Total Maniac. Eventually, after an hour, the effects subside, bringing an end to the unusual situation.

9.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades – Nazarick's Greatest Crisis
9.SummaryEnglish: Get ready for the craziest episode yet in "Pure Pure Pleiades - Nazarick's Greatest Crisis"! When the mischievous chibi Pleiades maids pull a harmless prank, little do they know it will trigger an uproarious catastrophe in Nazarick! In this episode preview, chaos ensues as the entire guild faces bizarre transformations and unexpected surprises. From Ainz Ooal Gown's hilarious attempts to fix the mess to the Pleiades' wild antics, laughter and excitement are guaranteed! Watch as the adorable chibi characters showcase their teamwork and ingenuity in tackling the wacky challenges thrown their way. But can they stop the ancient magical artifact before it causes irreversible chaos in Nazarick? Note: Bundled with the 11th volume of the light novel.

10.SummaryEnglish: First Overlord recap film featuring episodes one to seven of Season 1. Momonga gets trapped inside the game as his avatar Ainz Ooal Gown. He discovers his guild's tomb, where the NPCs gain sentience. Ainz, now a powerful overlord, protects Carne Village and gains loyal followers like Gazef. Disguised as adventurer Momon, he teams up with Nabe and takes quests. They explore a mysterious tomb and encounter the Swords of Darkness. Ainz secretly aids them in defeating the Wise King of the Forest, solidifying his hero reputation.

11.SummaryEnglish: Second Overlord recap film featuring episodes eight to thirteen of Season 1. Ainz, as Momon, continues his heroic facade while secretly searching for information about "Player vs Player." He saves the village of Trobell and gains recognition as a benevolent ruler. Meanwhile, Shalltear's jealousy leads to a fierce battle with Ainz. He ultimately subdues her but decides to investigate the unknown forces manipulating her. Ainz encounters Clementine, a dangerous warrior seeking artifacts, and defeats her. He learns about Shalltear's mind control and confronts her, eventually turning her back to his side. Ainz holds a meeting with the Floor Guardians, addressing the threat posed by "Player vs Player." The season concludes with Ainz facing new challenges and conspiracies in the ever-evolving world of Yggdrasil.

12.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - A Magical Beast's Love
12.SummaryEnglish: Hamsuke declares her love for another creature at a tea party with the Pleiades. Confused, the maids try to understand, but none recall such a creature in Nazarick. Seeking advice, Hamsuke turns to Albedo, who initially thinks it's about Ainz. After discovering the truth, Albedo supports Hamsuke's love interest. The maids set traps to capture the creature, who turns out to be Pandora's Actor, Ainz's creation. Unwilling to crush Hamsuke's hope, Ainz arranges a meeting. However, Hamsuke changes her mind, preferring her Death Knight companion. The misunderstanding is cleared, and Ainz praises everyone's efforts.

13.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - The Automaton and The Cat
13.SummaryEnglish: Pandora's Actor turns into a cat to gain affection, and serves as CZ Delta's cat for a time.

14.SummaryEnglish: A theater manners short bundled with the recap movie's BD/DVD releases.

16.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 1: Curtain Rise of Confusion
16.SummaryEnglish: As Ainz reaches out an supporting hand from Albedo, consoling him on his failure in preventing Shalltear's brainwashing, he immediately finds himself at the desk in an office space where all the NPCs are busy working, manning desks like a corporate facility. Ainz realizes that he in now the president of a company called Nazarick where all his employees are the NPCs from the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

17.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 2: Secretaries of the Company President

18.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 3: Gather, Executives

19.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 4: Amazing Loyalty

20.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 5: Director of Judgement

21.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 6: The Gatherers

22.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 7: Bits and Pieces

23.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 8: Feelings of the Customer

24.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 9: Ballistic People

25.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 10: Oh, I Wonder

26.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 11: A Dangerous One

27.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 12: Prelude to Industrial Upheaval

28.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 2 - Play 13: Curtain Rise to Despair

29.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 1: A Ruler’s New Melancholy

30.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 2: Shalltear Once More

31.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 3: His Distant and Worrying Delicate Status

32.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 4: The Guardian Overseer, in Short

33.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 5: One of the Two Pioneers

34.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 6: Invitation to Release

35.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 7: Otokonoko Entangled in a Fad

36.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 8: A Handful of Moe Elements

38.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 10: Preparation for Settlement

39.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 11: Another Battle

40.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 3 - Play 12: Mass Chaos

42.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Clementine Fugitive Version Episode 1
42.SummaryEnglish: One of the 12 executives of Zuranon, and former Black Scripture 9th Seat: Clementine. Having absolute confidence in her arms sets out in life to escape and conceal herself from a certain magic caster. At that time, Nazarick is gathering information about martial arts under the direction of Ainz Ooal Gown. Yuri Alpha and Lupusregina Beta set out to gather information for their master which leads to a bar at Beta's insistence. There they find Clementine drinking her woes. Lupusregina enthusiastically introduces her and Yuri to the fugitive. Clementine seeing that they are a bit strange but harmless decides to entertain them, introducing herself as Claire. She and Lupusregina get along and eventually the latter challenges the human to a drinking contest. Not willing to back down from a challenge Clementine accepts and the two women begin drinking large copious amounts of alcohol. Lupusregina manages to avoid being drunk using [Cure Poison] unbeknownst to Clementine.

43.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Clementine Fugitive Version Episode 2
43.SummaryEnglish: Clementine awakens from a hangover to find herself in a room. After she had been killed and later resurrected, Clementine in her current state right now felt tired of being on the run from her past. Before she can go on to explain her reason, she pukes on the spot. She decides with all things as they are she should leave. Solution Epsilon and Entoma Vasilissa Zeta come across the pub where their sisters had entered to gather information. The latter agrees assuredly and pays it a visit there. Outside Clementine vaguely recognizes the pub, however, draws a blank and decides to go in to gather supplies for her break to the Baharuth Empire. Clementine takes notice of the two maids while Entoma becomes aware of the fact that the former is watching them. Solution also takes attention of the girl who was watching them interact. Entoma asks whether they should kill her, but Solution dismisses the idea as they are currently gathering information under Ainz's orders.

44.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades - Clementine Fugitive Version Episode 3
44.SummaryEnglish: Clementine awakens in the same room as the previous episode. She wonders why she feels so embarrassed. She begins her introduction but stops mid-sentence, feeling something is off with this situation she was in. Back in the Great Tomb of Nazarick, Ainz Ooal Gown comments gathering information is hard. Albedo agrees stating that she will also regularly travel to the Re-Estize Kingdom to gather information. Ainz notes if it is a visit to the princess, he suggests asking Albedo if maybe she can get information on Martial Arts from her. Clementine finds the pub she was previously at in ruins. She remembers having a drink here, but that's all. She senses something bad had happened here. The barkeep calls her out and tells her despite the wreck, they were still willing to serve drinks regardless of the pub's ruins. Clementine asks what happened to the place, but the barkeeper breaks down mentally and cries on his knees. The fugitive thinks it's best that she leave and hurry to the Empire.

45.SummaryEnglish: At the bar, Éclair Éklair Éklare notices Sous-chef looking troubled. In a flashback, Sous-chef was ordered by Ainz Ooal Gown and Albedo to allow the Pleiades to work part-time at his bar to gain social interaction experience. Ainz plans for Nazarick to welcome various races, so they need to learn to interact with them. In the present, Sous-chef expresses concern to Éclair that the additional help may change the bar's atmosphere. As he prepares a drink for Éclair, the birdman assures him that he'll handle the cleaning, but Sous-chef declines, stating the place is already clean.

46.SummaryEnglish: At the 9th Floor bar, Yuri Alpha and Narberal Gamma thank Sous-chef for instructing them and address him as "Master," making him flustered. They insist it's the correct title since he's now their instructor. Sous-chef accepts, and they begin their training. He explains the importance of a relaxing atmosphere and clear glasses at a bar. Their first task is to wipe a glass clean, but Yuri attempts to punch it to test durability, stopped by Sous-chef. Narberal uses magic to make herself and the glass invisible, thinking she achieved the goal. The maids find the task unexpectedly challenging, and Éclair Éklair Éklare chuckles at the scene. The episode concludes with one of the maids accidentally breaking a glass, adding a humorous twist to their training.

47.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 4 - Play 3: Silver Bullet
47.SummaryEnglish: At the bar, Lupusregina Beta and CZ2128 Delta begin their training under Sous-chef's guidance. Lupusregina enthusiastically addresses him as "Master," but he feels a bit uneasy. Instead of cleaning glasses, Sous-chef decides to give them an introductory lesson on creating a welcoming bar atmosphere. Lupusregina attempts a maid café greeting, but Sous-chef explains it's not suitable for a bar. He emphasizes that bartenders must create an environment where customers want to return. However, Sous-chef gets distracted when he finds CZ hugging Éclair Éklair Éklare tightly. He reminds her that Éclair is a customer, and bartenders should maintain distance. CZ uses her Magic Gun's scope to observe Éclair from afar, creating tension for the birdman. Meanwhile, Lupusregina impresses Sous-chef by balancing three shot glasses on a concentrated CZ, adding a comedic touch to their training.

48.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 4 - Play 4: Pink Lady
48.SummaryEnglish: Solution Epsilon and Entoma Vasilissa Zeta arrive at the bar for training, but Sous-chef insists on a strict "no bugs" policy, confusing them. He emphasizes maintaining the bar's quality and cleanliness. They are tasked with dusting and bug-proofing the bar, which disappoints Solution. She refuses to clean due to her pride as a slime. Éclair Éklair Éklare volunteers to help clean, and Solution slyly convinces her to take on the task. However, Entoma returns with a cockroach snack, annoying Sous-chef, who already has his hands full with the quirky maids. Despite his faceless expressions, Sous-chef faces comedic challenges as he tries to maintain order and cleanliness in the bar.

49.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 4 - Play 5: Ilampol Pescatore
49.SummaryEnglish: Pestonya Shortcake Wanko and Éclair Éklair Éklare enjoy hot beverages at the bar with Sous-chef. He shares the challenges of teaching the combat-focused Pleiades to act like maids. Pestonya understands, as their purpose is to please the Supreme Beings. Éclair suggests making Sous-chef the ruler of Nazarick to avoid unreasonable tasks and keep the bar free of combat maids. However, this idea receives a cold response from their colleagues, and they gently scold Éclair for such thoughts. Feeling embarrassed and depressed, Éclair is consoled by Pestonya, who believes his behavior is influenced by the Supreme Beings. Inspired by their friendship, Sous-chef offers them a new drink, which they find delicious. They notice Pestonya has stopped using her "~woof" speech ticks and bark in embarrassment. A heartwarming moment ensues as the three continue to bond at the bar.

50.SummaryEnglish: At the bar, Narberal Gamma serves Mare Bello Fiore a drink, and they discuss their companions. Mare enjoys the drink, wishing Aura could join him. Narberal mentions that sometimes they quarrel, especially due to Lupusregina Beta's troublemaking behavior. Mare points out that Narberal and Solution Epsilon share similar personalities. Sous-chef observes Narberal's easy-going nature, likely influenced by her time outside with Ainz Ooal Gown. Meanwhile, Éclair Éklair Éklare asks for a wet towel and receives it thrown in his face by Narberal, surprising Sous-chef. Éclair claims he'll be the future ruler of Nazarick, but Mare advises him to abandon the dream for his safety. Narberal throws towels at Éclair when he talks about his ambitions, though Sous-chef finds it unacceptable behavior towards customers. Narberal offers Mare to participate, but he declines, stating that Éclair would be obliterated if he did. Despite the risks, Éclair remains undeterred in pursuing his dream.

51.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 4 - Play 7: Flat Vamp Air, flight Frodr 05
51.SummaryEnglish: Shalltear Bloodfallen enters the bar and is greeted by Lupusregina Beta, who announces it's now an open juice bar, confusing Shalltear. Sous-chef clarifies that the theme remains the same. Sous-chef warns Shalltear not to drink too much like before, but she assures him she's fine. Lupusregina teases Shalltear about being "full of stuffing," to which she playfully agrees. To distract Shalltear, Sous-chef offers her a celebratory cocktail, which she gladly accepts. Lupusregina prepares the drink, and Shalltear finds it delicious. Sous-chef suggests naming it after her, but Lupusregina playfully suggests "Flatchest Vampire Airline," before being stopped. Shalltear is left confused by the banter, enjoying her time at the bar.

52.SummaryEnglish: At the bar, Entoma Vasilissa Zeta offers Cocytus a bowl of sweets. Cocytus mentions Ainz Ooal Gown's plan of using "carrots and sticks," surprising Sous-chef and Entoma. Cocytus praises Ainz's greatness, and Sous-chef admits his confusion about the Pleiades' purpose at the bar. Entoma reminds them to think for themselves, impressing them with her eloquence. They discuss her hunger affecting her thoughts, but she assures them she ate before coming. Entoma playfully removes her mask to show her "pale" complexion, indicating hunger. Cocytus offers candy to ease her hunger, while Sous-chef apologizes for not having prepared food. Cocytus also craves more substantial fare. Éclair Éklair Éklare jokingly muses about Entoma's true nature. Despite eating candy, Entoma still hungers and eyes Éclair, who squeaks in fright at the sight of her drooling.

53.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 4 - Play 9: Blue Moon
53.SummaryEnglish: At the Bar, Sous-chef attends to Éclair Éklair Éklare and Albedo, while CZ2128 Delta playfully balances ice cubes on Éclair's head. Albedo sighs, expressing concern about Ainz Ooal Gown's upcoming battles. She worries about the inadequacy of their forces to conquer their targets efficiently. Sous-chef recalls Pestonya's talk about a special favor, but CZ interrupts, signaling to Éclair not to reveal the secret. Instead, Éclair jokes about becoming the next ruler if Ainz fails. Sous-chef reassures Albedo, stating they can't comprehend Ainz's true motives for the conflict. The true reason remains a secret, and Éclair thanks CZ, offering her to continue playing with the ice cubes on his head.

54.SummaryEnglish: Aura Bella Fiora enjoys cola and spaghetti prepared by Yuri Alpha at the bar. Sous-chef learns about Aura's upcoming errand to capture nobles, sending them to Neuronist Painkill, a fate worse than death. Yuri invites Aura to hang out later with Pestonya Shortcake Wanko for a meal. Aura is delighted, but Éclair Éklair Éklare's cough interrupts. Sous-chef passes his drink to Éclair, and the conversation continues. Aura praises Yuri's cooking, though the maid humbly mentions Pestonya's dishes are better. Aura finds both their cooking styles unique. Another cough from Éclair makes Sous-chef suggest he join the conversation, but the penguin denies any jealousy. As Sous-chef heads to the back room, Aura overhears his frustrations, using her keen hearing.

55.SummaryEnglish: At the bar, Sous-chef cleans alongside Solution Epsilon, discussing the upcoming advance of the Sorcerer Kingdom into the Re-Estize Kingdom. He recalls Demiurge's plans and hopes the bar will return to normal after the conquest. Solution playfully teases him, asking if he dislikes the company of beautiful women. Sous-chef compliments her observational skills, making her the most suited Pleiades for bartending. In a flashback, Demiurge praises Solution and expresses his desire for a Solution of his own. Back in the present, Sous-chef plans to improve the bar experience for Demiurge. Solution asks if he likes the quiet atmosphere and points to blushing Éclair Éklair Éklare, wondering if he'll be a problem. Sous-chef assures he won't be, as Éclair is quiet and afraid of Demiurge and Solution.

56.SummaryEnglish: At the bar, Sous-chef welcomes Sebas Tian and Tsuare, who were recommended to visit. The maids, Pleiades, are off for the day, but the unchanged atmosphere remains. Éclair encourages Tsuare to choose a drink while Sebas thanks Éclair for guiding her. Sous-chef presents a special cocktail called Tuarabas on the house. The Pleiades watch from behind the door, claiming they're working overtime, not spying. Sebas hears Tsuare's call, but it's just her embarrassment after sipping from a straw. Both blush, and Éclair cheers them on as Sous-chef playfully calls the onlookers "children."

57.TitleEnglish: Pure Pure Pleiades 4 - Play 13: The Supreme Being
57.SummaryEnglish: Ainz Ooal Gown sits at the Bar, discussing the Pleiades' training with Sous-chef. Misinterpreting Ainz's question, Sous-chef admits the maids clashed with the bar's solemn atmosphere but praises their friendliness and potential for smooth communication with other races. Ainz understands and appreciates the atmosphere created by Sous-chef's creator. Touched by Ainz's praise, Sous-chef vows to make the bar the premiere destination in Nazarick. Éclair appears, offering to clean the mess, and Ainz thanks him for his contribution during the maid's training. Éclair humorously thinks he's being considered as Ainz's replacement, but it's quickly denied. As the episode ends, Éclair remarks on Ainz's drink, unaware that he cannot consume it.

58.SummaryEnglish: At Anime Expo 2018 - Interview With Kugane Maruyama & Naoyuki Itou

59.SummaryEnglish: At Anime Expo 2018 - A Message From Minoru Ashina

60.SummaryEnglish: A special (Halloween) episode of the Pure Pure Pleiades. It is a crossover between Overlord and The Eminence In Shadow. For some reason, Ainz and Shadow have swapped bodies! But... no one has noticed?! Even if the masters have swapped, there's no problem!

61.SummaryEnglish: After twelve years of playing his favorite MMORPG game, Momonga logs in for the last time only to find himself transported into its world playing it indefinitely. Throughout his adventures, his avatar ascends to the title of Sorcerer King Ains Ooal Gown. Once prosperous but now on the brink of ruin, The Sacred Kingdom enjoyed years of peace after construction of an enormous wall protecting them from neighboring invasions. But, one day this comes to an end when the Demon Emperor Jaldabaoth arrives with an army of villainous demi-humans. Fearing invasion of their own lands, the neighboring territory of the Slane Theocracy is forced to beg their enemies at the Sorcerer Kingdom for help. Heeding the call, Momonga, now known as the Sorcerer King Ains Ooal Gown, rallies the Sorcerer Kingdom and its undead army to join the fight alongside the Sacred Kingdom and the Slane Theocracy in hopes to defeat the Demon Emperor.

1.SummaryEnglish: Momonga is a regular salaryman who leads a guild in an DMMO-RPG known as Yggdrasil. After twelve years of playing the game, the servers are finally shutting down. Momonga logs in for the last time, seeing the game to its end. However, after the clock strikes midnight, nothing changes.

2.SummaryEnglish: Grateful that they weren't cast aside, the floor guardians experience the rule of their true master for the first time. Momonga quickly assess the situation and works toward protecting the tomb from invaders while contemplating what he must do.

3.SummaryEnglish: Momonga continues his efforts to protect Nazarick from the unknown forces he may be up against in this world. As he manipulates the Mirror of Remote Viewing, he notices a village being attacked and decides to test his strength against humans.

4.SummaryEnglish: Momonga finds that the attackers of Carne Village were Slane Theocracy soldiers dressed as people from the Baharuth Empire. As the attack to lure and eliminate Gazef Stronoff continues, Momonga takes this chance to continue his tests...

5.SummaryEnglish: Momonga sets out with Narberal disguised as humans under the names of Momon and Nabe for the city of E-Rantel. There they register to become adventurers in order to gain more information about this unknown world. As they do, evil gathers around them.

6.SummaryEnglish: While Momonga has some doubts, he accepts Nphirea Balear's request under the condition that the members of the Swords of Darkness join them. Though her urge to kill keeps distracting her, Clementine continues to slowly find her way to Nphirea.

7.SummaryEnglish: Momonga and his group continue to Carne Village. There they see that the villagers are working toward fortifying their defenses against possible future enemies. Nphirea meets up with Enri and asks her about this man named Ains Ooal Gown.

8.SummaryEnglish: After Momonga registers Hamusuke with the guild, he goes to Nphirea's home to find that his client has been kidnapped. The zombified remains of the Swords of Darkness litter the storage room. And there, Momonga finds the tortured body of Ninya.

9.SummaryEnglish: Momonga and Narberal begin their respective battles against Clementine and Khajit. Momonga takes this chance to learn about the mechanics of fighting in this world, but in the end, he must show Clementine the consequences of offending him.

10.SummaryEnglish: Momonga finds out that Shalltear has revolted against him, due to something that had happened while she was on her mission with Sebas and Solution. The story rewinds a bit and goes over that very event. What could possibly change her loyalty to him?

11.SummaryEnglish: Momonga does damage control at the guild while he assesses the reason for Shalltear's revolt. Coming to the conclusion that she is under an incurable status effect, Momonga goes to the treasury to retrieve some of the powerful weapons of Nazarick.

12.SummaryEnglish: Though Shalltear's skill set puts Momonga at a complete disadvantage, he steps forward into battle. He gave various world items to his guardians to ensure the safety of Nazarick in his absence. Now, all that is left is a battle of life and death!

13.SummaryEnglish: Momonga reminds Shalltear that he is the master of Nazarick and that his name carries the weight of all the supreme beings of Ains Ooal Gown. After the battle comes to a close, Momonga quickly takes action to strengthen the defenses of Nazarick.

1.SummaryEnglish: Officers of the Slane Theocracy gather to discuss recent losses. The noblemen of Estize plot to push back the Empire. Ains surveys a world map as his plans are set in motion. Shalltear recovers from her ordeal.

2.SummaryEnglish: Cocytus gives a declaration of war to all the tribes of the Lizardmen, expecting an easy takeover. However, the Lizardmen decide to try to unite their tribes against their common foe.

3.SummaryEnglish: Zenberu tests Zaryusu's strength in combat, while the latter defends Crusch's honor. The Lizardmen chiefs conduct a war council, and formulate a strategy to defend themselves against their common enemy.

4.SummaryEnglish: The alliance of the Lizard men win the battle and defeat the army of undead. The defeat guardian Cocytus and the new ability to learn from their mistakes, prove that the guardians can adapt to new situations. Ainz Ooal Gown therefore changes his tactics, ordering Cocytus to bring the Lizard men to their knees and under the rule of the Great Tomb of Nazarick.

5.SummaryEnglish: At the outpost in the Tob Forest, Ains strategizes with his guardians, and imposes Shalltear's penance upon her. The Lizard Man chiefs assemble and receive Cocytus on the battlefield for their final showdown.

6.TitleEnglish: Those Who Pick Up, Those Who Are Picked Up
6.SummaryEnglish: Sebas happens upon a near-lifeless woman, and takes her under his protection. Brain, left defeated by his encounter with Shalltear, meets up with Gazef. Members of the Blue Rose take measures against a drug plantation

7.SummaryEnglish: Gazef finds Climb practicing with his sword outside the castle, and asks to spar with him. Renner and Lakyus examine the coded document recovered by Evileye. Sebas finds himself beset upon from all sides over Tuare.

8.SummaryEnglish: Climb delivers Lakyus's message to Evileye and Gagaran, who offer guidance to the young man. Climb happens upon some men beating up a boy in the street, who is then rescued by Sebas, from whom he seeks training.

9.SummaryEnglish: Sebas begins his raid of the brothel from one side, while Climb and Brain enter from the other side. While Climb covers the exit alone, he is confronted by Succulent and Cocco Doll trying to flee and a desperate fight begins.

10.TitleEnglish: Disturbance Begins in the Royal Capital
10.SummaryEnglish: Ains calls on Sebas to answer for his actions, and to discuss what is to become of Tuare. Renner meets with the Blue Rose, then Marquis Raeven, to consult with them about her planned attacks against Eight Fingers.

11.SummaryEnglish: Demiurge takes charge of Nazarick's forces, laying out the mission to strike at Eight Fingers. Meanwhile, Lakyus details a similar mission to her squad captains. Sebas, Climb, and Brain raid Six Arms' compound together.

12.TitleEnglish: The Final Battle of the Disturbance
12.SummaryEnglish: Evileye petitions Momon to help her, and he begins fighting the disguised Demiurge. As Climb and the others try to get Tuare out of the compound, they face resistance. Renner convenes an emergency strategy meeting.

13.SummaryEnglish: The guardsmen and adventurers face a daunting array of demons until Momon arrives and takes charge. Brain once again comes face to face with Shalltear. While Evileye is occupied, Demiurge reveals his plan to Ains.

1.SummaryEnglish: With the events of Re-Estize Kingdom and the Lizard Men behind them, the loyal servants of Nazarick return to their daily routines. Ains, however, is worried about the work/life balance of his NPCs. They work day in and day out without rest...

2.SummaryEnglish: As Nazarick decides on their next steps, the village of Carne focuses on rebuilding their homes. Enri and her goblin troop are busy protecting the villagers, training the vigilante troop, and manning the fields. All the while, unrest builds in the forest.

3.SummaryEnglish: Enri meets Agu, who tells everyone that the Giant of the East and Demon Snake of the West are gathering forces to fight the master of the Monument of Ruin. Enri and the others take action, but little does she know how crazy the day will become...

4.TitleEnglish: Giant of the East, Demon Snake of the West
4.SummaryEnglish: Ains decides to go and see the Giant of the East and Demon Snake of the West himself. If they are similar to Hamusuke, they may have some worth as experimental subjects. They may also be useful in testing Lupisregina's capabilities with the village.

5.SummaryEnglish: The "Giant of the East" has come to attack Carne Village, but the villagers are willing to put their lives on the line to protect their home and families. While the goblin troop defends the front gates, Enri and Nphirea defends the village from behind.

6.SummaryEnglish: The Tomb of Nazarick continues their plan for world domination and Ains visits the Baharuth Empire as Momon of Darkness. Meanwhile, Count Femel hires a large number of Workers to explore a certain tomb recently discovered in Re-Estize Kingdom.

7.TitleEnglish: Butterfly Entangled in a Spider's Web
7.SummaryEnglish: The foolish workers that have entered the Tomb of Nazarick greatly anger Ains Ooal Gown. Albedo and the others have already finished preparations for their welcome and Lord Ains watches on, determined that not a single one leaves his tomb alive.

8.SummaryEnglish: The worker group Foresight is teleported to the fighting arena in the sixth floor to challenge the great Ains Ooal Gown. Ains tries to restrain his smoldering fury as he disposes the last of the filthy thieves that dare trample into his treasured Nazarick.

9.SummaryEnglish: Ainz sends Aura and Mare to the Empire with a message. Come and apologize or watch as your country burn to the ground. With no other option, Emperor Jircniv heads toward Nazarick with the head of a noble in tow. Though, things are not as they seem.

10.SummaryEnglish: Re-Estize Kingdom prepares for war after receiving a declaration from the Empire that they will claim the land near E-Rantel for the Sorcerer King Gown. Gazef knows the magic caster's strength, but he cannot stop what has already been set into motion.

11.SummaryEnglish: Carne Village is in a pinch once again. An army led by the first prince of Re-Estize has appeared, demanding to be let in so the villagers can be questioned about Ains Ooal Gown. Enri must make a decision for the village and its people.

12.SummaryEnglish: The war is finally starting. The Empire plans to use this chance to see the depths of the Sorcerer King's strength and the Kingdom is confident that their have fully prepared themselves for this war. Gazef stands ready. Now, let the despair begin.

13.SummaryEnglish: Gazef challenges Ains to a duel that is impossible to win and Ains decides to accept. The battle will soon come to an end and the fate of E-Rantel will be decided. Even amongst the bloodshed, Gazef and Ains both hold the other in deep respect.

1.TitleEnglish: Ains Ooal Gown Nation of Leading Darkness
1.SummaryEnglish: As Ains muddles his way through ruling his new kingdom, he continues to ponder over a particularly important question. Everyone in his kingdom and the Tomb of Nazarick is also waiting for his answer. What kind of kingdom does he wish to create?

2.SummaryEnglish: Albedo personally makes her way to Re-Estize Kingdom as an envoy of the Sorcerer Kingdom. Meanwhile, the people of Re-Estize continue to do what they can to recover from the recent war and prepare for the future. Though not everyone has peace in mind.

3.SummaryEnglish: The major powers in other countries grow increasingly wary about the Sorcerer Kingdom. Especially the emperor of the Barahuth Empire, who might go bald from the stress induced by the overwhelming power of Ains Ooal Gown. On which side will he stand?

4.SummaryEnglish: While Albedo and the others make their moves toward world domination, Ains has his own little plan. He wants to cultivate true adventurers to explore the unknown, like the players in Yggdrasil. His recruitment efforts bring him to the Baharuth Empire...

5.TitleEnglish: In Pursuit of the Land of Dwarves
5.SummaryEnglish: After his visit to the Empire, Ains decides to go and create a friendly relationship with the Dwarf Kingdom. Sadly, he only finds an empty city when he gets there. Deep within the tunnels, he meets a dwarf named Gondo who tells him happened.

6.SummaryEnglish: Ains decides to lend a hand to the dwarves fighting against the Quagoa, but not for free. He wants to gather Gondo and the other runesmiths for the Sorcerer Kingdom. At the same time, Ains happens to find the perfect chance to teach Shalltear a thing or two.

7.SummaryEnglish: The Clan Lord discovers that Ains and his group are approaching the royal capital and asks the frost dragons for help. The Dragon Lord sends his son to intercept the party, while Ains decides to split up the group to confront the Quagoa and frost dragons.

8.SummaryEnglish: While various things are happening in the neighboring countries, Philip continues to wallow in failure within the Re-Estize Kingdom. After meeting with some nobles from his new faction and he suddenly comes up with a brilliant idea...

9.SummaryEnglish: The Sorcerer Kingdom declares war against the Re-Estize Kingdom and gives them exactly one month to prepare. Ains plans to show the world what happens to the enemies of Ains Ooal Gown. However, a few in Nazarick consider this massacre excessive.

10.SummaryEnglish: Ains and his army marches towards the royal capital to finally annihilate the Re-Estize Kingdom. Various forces prepare themselves for the coming onslaught. Before the last battle, Zanac rides alone to meet with Ains for a peaceful discussion.

11.SummaryEnglish: To gain more information, Ains and Albedo use themselves as bait as they approach the royal capital. Azuth comes to defend the capital and quickly separates the two. While the two of them exchange blows in the air, a mysterious figure comes to visit Ains.

12.SummaryEnglish: Everyone in the Re-Estize Kingdom makes their final preparations as the Sorcerer Kingdom's army invades the royal capital. Some try to escape and some just wait to die. But there are a few among them who wish to fight until the very end.

13.TitleEnglish: The Witch of the Falling Kingdom
13.SummaryEnglish: Princess Renner decides to stay with her father and struggle against the Sorcerer King until the very end. Climb follows the orders of the princess and sneaks out of the royal palace only to be surprised at what he greets him when he returns.
